production_notes: Ensure BILAN logo on kraft paper bag is clearly visible and legible throughout the shot
Maintain consistent product positioning (20-30% of lower frame) across all 32 state videos
Background landmark should be recognizable to state residents but not overpower the product focus
Subtle animation should be 'felt' rather than 'watched' - viewer focus stays on BILAN product
Shoot at [SPECIFIC_FRAME_RATE] to achieve the desired motion effect for this state's environment
Natural color temperature ([COLOR_TEMP]K) should feel authentic to state's climate and time of day
Vertical 9:16 format is critical - do NOT crop from horizontal footage
Reserve top 30-35% of frame for post-production text overlays (state name, tagline, CTA)
Glass condensation is important visual cue for refreshment and cold drink appeal
Natural surface selection should be environmentally appropriate to state (coastal=driftwood, desert=stone, jungle=mossy rock, etc.)
